name: @avito/core
description: Shared utilities for desktop / mav versions of avito design system
author: vyuklepov <vyuklepov@avito.ru>

scripts.build: yarn build:cjs & yarn build:esm & yarn build:types
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir cjs --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --source-maps --root-mode=upward --delete-dir-on-start
scripts.build:esm: cross-env NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel src --out-dir esm --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --source-maps --root-mode=upward --delete-dir-on-start
